review: Patiently listens to all issues, symptoms, asks multiple questions too before concluding anything. Also thoroughly examines the baby without cutting corners. The prescription too is kept to minimal without recommending unnecessary meds. Overall had a very positive experience.

My experience with Dr. Mahima Shetty has always been so pleasant. He is such a nice doctor who has a wonderful knowledge of children health. He never recommends many medicines and is always ready to listen to all my questions patiently. I am so happy that he is my son Ahamed ILHAN pediatrician. Thanks a lot Dr. Mahima Shetty.

review: I am taking my kid to Dr. Mahima Shetty since last three years. He has good experience and give ample time to let us tell the complete history and then provide a clear and complete explanation of the medical condition and treatment. He also do not recommend unnecessary tests.

reply_text:
We are really sorry for the inconvenience, cleanliness of the clinic is of utmost importance for us 

 those insects /flies appear suddenly soon after rains they are harmless and they will be there for few hours, it's common everywhere in Bangalore, only way to control them is to switch of the lights, which is very difficult to do when patients are there in clinic, hope you understand.
